arts.ttl: Everton 2-0 Brighton (24 de Ago., 2025) Resultado Final
arts.sum: In addition to the above toggle, you may choose to provide the information requested in this opt-out form, which may enable us to take action on your opt-out election more broadly than just on this digital property. arts.ttl: Everton 2-0 Brighton: New stadium opens with win as Grealish shines on full debut
arts.sum: Jack Grealish racing down the wing on his home debut and crossing for Iliman Ndiaye to score along with James Garner lashing in a drive from distance were exhibits of what Moyes, and Everton supporters, will want to see on a more frequent basis. Brighton were twice denied by the frame of the goal, a rare lapse from James Tarkowski almost proved costly before half time and Jordan Pickford saved a weak penalty from Danny Welbeck .

arts.ttl: Jack Grealish makes honest admission about 'last two years' at Man City after starring in Everton's historic victory over Brighton
arts.sum: Grealish teed up Iliman Ndiaye to score the first goal at the club's new home, before laying on James Garner's long-range strike that sealed the points for the Toffees.

arts.ttl: No excuses - what Hurzeler said about lack of attacking options in defeat at Everton
arts.sum: Fabian Hurzeler runs out of attacking options as his lose 2-0 at Everton

arts.ttl: Everton vs Brighton - Player Ratings: Grealish and Pickford sublime
arts.sum: Everton marked a historic day at their new stadium with a fine performance, securing a 2-0 win over Brighton.

arts.ttl: Grealish stars as Everton beat Brighton to make perfect start at new stadium
arts.sum: Everton made the perfect start to life at the Hill Dickinson Stadium with a 2-0 win over Brighton in which Jack Grealish assisted both goals.

arts.ttl: Super Jack! Grealish shines as Everton begin life in new stadium with a win over Brighton
arts.sum: Jack Grealish provides two assists as Everton record a 2-0 victory over Brighton & Hove Albion in their first match at their new Hill Dickinson Stadium.

arts.ttl: Palace v Forest/Everton v Brighton team news: Grealish + Barry start, no Rutter
arts.sum: Two more Premier League matches kick-off at 2pm BST The post Palace v Forest/Everton v Brighton team news: Grealish + Barry start, no Rutter appeared first on Best FPL Tips, Advice, Team News, Picks, and Statistics from Fantasy Football Scout.

arts.ttl: Everton vs Brighton Preview: Premier League, Matchday 2, 2025
arts.sum: Jack Grealish is expected to be selected from the start in this one as the Toffees look for a significant improvement on the attacking performance on display at Elland Road. David Moyes' Everton will play their first ever competitive match at the new Hill Dickinson Stadium as the host of Brighton.

arts.ttl: Brighton and Hove Albion predicted XI against Everton as Georginio Rutter continues up front
arts.sum: Fabian Hurzeler wants to spoil the Everton party
